title: Lost promos do Diamond 3 with only 1 loss?
body:
I played a game of tristana and went 14/6, that was the game that got me into diamond 3 promos. I then lost a 4v5 since rakan dc'd and nid flamed the team and ended 2/0, it then said "you have been unsuccessful in your series", after only 1 loss? Unfortunately I forgot to screenshot that but I know for a fact I was in d3 promos because I recently demoted then played a thresh, kassadin and then the tristana game that got me into promos.

Ranked ladder - https://gyazo.com/a2f33bd1a30057b57fbb1ea0a79a018f
Match history - https://gyazo.com/c809f45f49ae664d8b55c2c18ea1c189
The actual game - https://gyazo.com/759720eec8cd9563a29a179bc2a010b2
OP.GG - http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=khone

If I could have some clarification on why I failed series after 1 game it would me much appreciated, ty.

replies.body: Hi Khone, I looked into it and you dodged a lobby during your series, which counts as a loss when you're in a series. So another loss would fail the promo series as expected.
Sorry for the late reply, thanks anyway though!
